member.remarks: Typically this is a confirmation page on your web site.

member.summary: Uri to where the user review the signature or read the rules.
member.remarks: Typically this is the signature page on your web site.

member.name: P:Uol.PagSeguro.Domain.PreApprovalRequest.Reference
member.remarks: Optional. You can use the reference code to store an identifier so you can associate the PagSeguro transaction to a transaction in your system.

member.summary: Party that will be sending the money

member.name: P:Uol.PagSeguro.Domain.PreApprovalRequest.Currency
member.remarks: The expected currency values are defined in the Currencty class.

member.name: P:Uol.PagSeguro.Domain.PreApprovalRequest.NotificationURL
member.summary:
Determines for which url PagSeguro will send the order related notifications codes.
Optional. Any change happens in the transaction status, a new notification request will be send to this url. You can use that for update the related order.

member.name: P:Uol.PagSeguro.Domain.PaymentRequest.RedirectUri
member.summary: Uri to where the PagSeguro payment page should redirect the user after the payment information is processed.
member.remarks: Typically this is a confirmation page on your web site.

member.summary: Uri to where the user review the signature or read the rules.
member.remarks: Typically this is the signature page on your web site.

member.name: P:Uol.PagSeguro.Domain.PaymentRequest.ExtraAmount
member.summary: Extra amount to be added to the transaction total
member.remarks: This value can be used to add an extra charge to the transaction or provide a discount in the case ExtraAmount is a negative value.

member.name: P:Uol.PagSeguro.Domain.PaymentRequest.Reference
member.remarks: Optional. You can use the reference code to store an identifier so you can associate the PagSeguro transaction to a transaction in your system.

member.name: P:Uol.PagSeguro.Domain.PaymentRequest.Shipping
member.summary: Shipping information associated with this payment request

member.name: P:Uol.PagSeguro.Domain.PaymentRequest.MaxAge
member.summary: How long this payment request will remain valid, in seconds.
member.remarks: Optional. After this payment request is submitted, the payment code returned will remain valid for the period specified here.

member.name: P:Uol.PagSeguro.Domain.PaymentRequest.MaxUses
member.summary: How many times the payment redirect uri returned by the payment web service can be accessed.
member.remarks: Optional. After this payment request is submitted, the payment redirect uri returned by the payment web service will remain valid for the number of uses specified here.

member.name: P:Uol.PagSeguro.Domain.PaymentRequest.NotificationURL
member.summary:
Determines for which url PagSeguro will send the order related notifications codes.
Optional. Any change happens in the transaction status, a new notification request will be send to this url. You can use that for update the related order.

member.summary: Common implmentation of all SearchByDate methods
member.param: End of date range. Use DateTime.MaxValue to search without an upper boundary.
Page number, starting with 1. If passed as 0, it will call the web service to get the default page, also page number 1.
